Q

queueingSweep() - Method in class com.smokejumperit.cleanSweep.Sweeper
Performs a sweep in the current thread, but cleanup work is done via the Executor.

R

registerShutdownHook() - Method in class com.smokejumperit.cleanSweep.Sweeper

S

setTarget(T) - Method in class com.smokejumperit.cleanSweep.Sweeper.SweepAction
Sets the object which triggered the cleanup action.
shutdown() - Method in class com.smokejumperit.cleanSweep.Sweeper
Prevents the Sweeper from processing new objects, and returns a collection of Runnable objects that have not been cleaned up.
sweep() - Method in class com.smokejumperit.cleanSweep.Sweeper
Performs a sweep and cleanup in the current thread.
Sweeper - Class in com.smokejumperit.cleanSweep
This class is responsible for monitoring and performing clean-up on garbage collected objects.
Sweeper() - Constructor for class com.smokejumperit.cleanSweep.Sweeper
Constructs a default instance that uses daemon threads at maximum priority for the polling and cleanup tasks.
Sweeper(ThreadFactory) - Constructor for class com.smokejumperit.cleanSweep.Sweeper
Constructs an instance that uses the given ThreadFactory to create threads for polling and cleanup tasks.
Sweeper(Executor) - Constructor for class com.smokejumperit.cleanSweep.Sweeper
Constructs an instance that uses the given Executor to execute polling and cleanup tasks, including a background sweeping thread.
Sweeper(Executor, boolean) - Constructor for class com.smokejumperit.cleanSweep.Sweeper
Constructs an instance that uses the given Executor to execute polling and cleanup tasks.
Sweeper.SweepAction<T> - Class in com.smokejumperit.cleanSweep
An action performed when a sweep occurs and the target is known.
Sweeper.SweepAction() - Constructor for class com.smokejumperit.cleanSweep.Sweeper.SweepAction
